home.title: Home Page
home.welcome: Welcome to the React project with Router, Tailwind CSS and Proxy configured!

tcm.todayInfo: Today's宜忌: Lidong. 宜 replenish nutrients, 忌 raw and cold food.
tcm.videoTitle: Five Common Acupoint Massage Techniques at Home
tcm.videoDesc: Learn basic positions and massage techniques for common acupoints like Hegu, Zusanli, and Neiguan to relieve daily minor ailments.
tcm.discussionTitle: Any good dietary recommendations for insomnia?
tcm.discussionContent: Recently, I'm under a lot of work pressure and have trouble falling asleep at night, often waking up in the middle of the night. I heard that Suanzaoren is effective. Do you have any recommended recipes or usage methods? I don't want to rely on sleeping pills all the time.
tcm.timeAdvice: Bladder meridian active, drink more water

about.title: About Page
about.description: This is a standard React project template with the following features:

router.title: React Router
router.description: Configured for client-side navigation between pages.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Utility-first CSS framework for fast and responsive styling.

proxy.title: API Proxy
proxy.description: Vite proxy configured for handling API requests.

axios.title: Axios
axios.description: HTTP client for making API calls with promises.

howToUse.title: How to Use:
steps: Run npm run dev to start the development server
Navigate between Home and About pages using the navigation menu
Use the API fetch button on the Home page to test proxy functionality
Customize the proxy configuration in vite.config.js
Add more pages in the src/pages directory
